name: My Home is You.
description:
Casbah is going to move in with their cute and excentric partner Marta! Then they find out that they both are going to live on abandoned morgue... Y'know, where there used to be dead bodies?
Follow Casbah on their first week of living together with their partner.

Writing - TheLastYuriSamurai and TangledVirus.
Art/Programing/GUI - TangledVirus.
This game uses the GUI prompt made by BaíYù.
